programme.title: Bean an Tí sa Chistin
programme.desc: Beidh Máire Ní Óbáin as Coláiste Chamuis in iomaíocht le Mali Uí Chlochartaigh as Coláiste Chiaráin. (Máire Ní Óbáin takes on Mali Uí Chlochartaigh.)

programme.title: Paisean Faisean

programme.title: Amhráin is Ansa Liom

programme.title: France 24

programme.title: Saol Faoi Shráid

programme.title: Garáiste Gecko

programme.title: Balloon Barnyard
programme.desc: Tá Tuck bocht sáinnithe ar an díon. An mbeidh Pip agus Streak in ann cúnamh a thabhairt dó teacht anuas? (Poor Tuck is stuck on the roof.)

programme.title: Mecha Builders
programme.desc: Is é inniu Lá an Bheatha agus tá an baile ag ceiliúradh an bheatha is fearr leo. (It's Food Day in Pretty Big City but the banana atop their banana split statue is not split.)

programme.title: Mecha Builders
programme.desc: Castar air an chraein mhaighnéadach ar an láithreán tógála trí thimpiste. (The magnet crane at the construction site accidentally turns on.)

programme.title: PJ Masks
programme.desc: Tugann Lionel bia do Liamín, peata Greg, agus déantar Liamín-Easáir de. (Romeo was feeding Lionel some green pet treats that makes him big and calls him Lionel-Saurus.)

programme.title: Finny an Siorc
programme.desc: Tá Finny agus a cuid cairde ag iarraidh dráma a chur ar siúl faoin múinteoir. (Finny's class is making a play about their teacher, Mr. Magellan.)

programme.title: Dinocity
programme.desc: Tá Ricky ag iarraidh a fhiacail a tharraingt go dtiocfaidh sióg na bhfiacla chuige. (Ricky is trying his best to lose a tooth so that the tooth fairy will come to visit him.)

programme.title: Dinocity
programme.desc: Bíonn Ricky agus Boo ag iarraidh a bheith chomh cabhrach is a bhfuil siad in ann a bheith inniu. (Today, Ricky and Boo try their very best to be helpful.)

programme.title: Dinocity
programme.desc: Bíonn Ricky curtha soir nuair nach mbíonn sé in ann amhrán a chur as a cheann. (Ricky is up in a heap when he can't get a song out of his head.)

programme.title: Dinocity
programme.desc: Bíonn dul amú ar Tyra agus Ricky agus iad ag úsáid boscaí bruscair nua. (Tyra and Ricky make a mistake while using the new bins for unwanted things.)

programme.title: Cat a' Hata
programme.desc: Tá Nic agus Sailí ag spraoi sa phuiteach ach caithfidh siad iad féin a níochán anois. (Nick and Sally have been playing in the mud, and now they need to get clean!)

programme.title: Cat a' Hata
programme.desc: Bíonn Sailí agus Nic ag spraoi sa teachín sa gcrann nuair a ghlaonn máthair Nic orthu don lón. (Sally and Nick are playing up in their tree house.)

programme.title: Cat a' Hata
programme.desc: Is maith le Nic agus Sailí a bheith ag dul i bhfolach ach níl Sailí go maith ag an gcluiche seo. (Nick and Sally are playing hide-and-seek but Sally keeps getting found.)

programme.title: Cat a' Hata
programme.desc: Tá Sailí ag iarraidh uisce a chur ar na plandaí ach níl sé te ná grianmhar taobh amuigh. (Sally wants to water the plants in her backyard but it's not hot and sunny outside.)

programme.title: Cat a' Hata
programme.desc: Tá an geansaí is fearr le Nic róbheag aige ach níl sé ag iarraidh é a chaitheamh amach. (Nick has grown out of his favourite sweater but he doesn't want to part with it.)

programme.title: Zak Jinks
programme.desc: Tá an tUasal Mac Gabhann ag ceapadh go mbeidh na gasúir sásta glasraí as a ngarraí féin a ithe. (Will the children eat the vegetables if they grow them?)

programme.title: Zak Jinks
programme.desc: Socraíonn Zak cúpla cleas a imirt ar na múinteoirí ionaid. (Zak thinks up plenty of pranks to play on the substitute teachers.)

programme.title: Polly Pocket
programme.desc: Tagann Polly agus a cairde ar chat dhamhsóir mór le rá as an mBrasaíl. (Polly and her friends find a famous Brazilian dancer's lost cat.)

programme.title: Polly Pocket
programme.desc: Téann Polly agus a cairde ag taisteal mórthimpeall Rio. (Polly and her friends travel around Rio to reunite Torta with his teacher.)

programme.title: Polly Pocket
